Atha kho āyasmā vacchagotto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi khīṇā jāti vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ nāparaṁ itthattāyāti abbhaññāsi. Aññataro kho panāyasmā vacchagotto arahataṁ ahosi.
Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gacchanti. Addasā kho
āyasmā vacchagotto te bhikkhū dūratova gacchante Ma. āgacchante. disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca handa kahaṁ pana tumhe āyasmanto gacchathāti. Bhagavantaṁ kho mayaṁ āvuso dassanāya
Gacchāmāti. Tenahāyasmanto mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha vacchagotto Ma. vacchagotto ... vandatīti ime pāṭhā na dissanti. bhante bhikkhu bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati evañca vadeti Ma. vadetha. pariciṇṇo me bhagavā pariciṇṇo me sugatoti. Evamāvusoti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vacchagottassa paccassosuṁ. Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā Ma. abhivādetvā ... te bhikkhūti ime pāṭhā na dissanti. ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ āyasmā bhante vacchagotto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati evañca vadeti pariciṇṇo me bhagavā pariciṇṇo me sugatoti. Pubbeva me Ma. mayā. bhikkhave vacchagotto Ma. vacchagottassa bhikkhuno. bhikkhu cetasā ceto paricca vidito tevijjo vacchagotto bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti. Devatāpi me etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ tevijjo bhante vacchagotto bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti. Idamavoca bhagavā attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti. Mahāvacchagottasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
